Raula Gaikovina Kula, Dr. Eng.

Research Assistant Professor (特任助教)

Software Engineering Lab @ Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Nara, Japan

  • Mentor/Teacher
  • Researcher/Scientist
  • Software Engineer

2017

  1. Kula, R. G., Ouni, A., German, D. M., & Inoue, K. (2017). Do Developers Update their Library Dependencies? An Empirical Study on Library Migration Practices. Empirical Software Engineering, EMSE, 2017, 1–34. Retrieved from http://sel.ist.osaka-u.ac.jp/lab-db/betuzuri/archive/1082/1082.pdf

2016

  1. Ishio, T., Kula, R. G., Kanda, T., German, D., & Inoue, K. (2016). Software Ingredients: Detection of Third-party Component Reuse in Java Software Release. In The 13th International Conference on Mining Software Repositories, MSR 2016, Austin, Texas, May 14-15, 2016 (pp. 339–350). Retrieved from http://sel.ist.osaka-u.ac.jp/people/raula-k/publications/PID4139355.pdf
  2. Yang, X., Kula, R. G., Yoshida, N., & Iida, H. (2016). Mining the Modern Code Review Repositories: A Dataset of People, Process and Product. In The 13th International Conference on Mining Software Repositories, MSR 2016, Austin, Texas, May 14-15, 2016 (pp. 460–463). Retrieved from http://sdlab.naist.jp/pman3/pman3.cgi?DOWNLOAD=157
  3. Saied, M. A., Ouni, A., Kula, H. S. R. G., & Inoue, K. (2016). Automated Inference of Software Library Usage Patterns. In Automated Software Engineering (ASE) 2016(submitted).
  4. Ouni, A., Kula, R. G., & Inoue, K. (2016). Search-Based Peer Reviewers Recommendation in Modern Code Review. In The 32th International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution, ICSME 2016, Raleigh, North Carolina, Oct 2-10, 2016 (to appear).
  5. Ouni, A., Kula, R. G., & Inoue, K. (2016). Search-Based Peer Reviewers Recommendation in Modern Code Review. In The 32th International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution, ICSME 2016, Raleigh, North Carolina, Oct 2-10, 2016 (to appear).
  6. Yano, Y., Kula, R. G., Ishio, T., & Inoue, K. (2016). Hidden Dependencies on Vulnerable Components in Java: An Exploratory Study. Poster. In IWESEP2016 Poster session, Osaka, Japan, March 13th, 2016. Retrieved from http://iwesep2016.naist.jp/program/
  7. Yang, X., Yoshida, N., Kula, R. G., & Iida, H. (2016). Peer Review Social Network (PeRSoN) in Open Source Projects. IEICE TRANSACTIONS, IEICE 2016, 99-D(3), 661–670. Retrieved from http://sel.ist.osaka-u.ac.jp/lab-db/betuzuri/archive/1018/1018.pdf
